items.title: Depart from KUL Airport (D7 552)
items.description: Flight depart from KLIA Terminal 2
items.note: Arrive 3 Hours prior to departure

items.title: Arrive at HND Airport
items.description: Perform Immigration Check and Fresh up, Jamak Prayer
items.note: Prayer room at Kaunter M Level 3

items.title: Buy Suica Card
items.description: Vending machine in the Terminal 3 arrivals area
items.note: Vending machine in the Terminal 3 arrivals area

items.title: Refreshment & Rest
items.description: Rest at airport lounge or lobby
items.note: Rest at Level 5

title: Minato, Itabashi and Shinjuku City Exploration

items.title: Exit from HND Airport
items.description: Depart from Haneda Airport to Minato City
items.note: Take Keikyu Airport Line to Keikyu Main Line, then Asakusa Line to Daimon City

items.title: Tokyo Tower
items.description: Visit the iconic Tokyo Tower in Minato City for panoramic views of Tokyo
items.note: Store Luggage at Daimon Station

items.title: Go to Itabashi City
items.description: Retrieve Luggage from coin lockers and go to Itabashi City
items.note: Rest and freshen up after check-in

items.title: Drop Luggage at Airbnb
items.description: Drop Luggage at Airbnb
items.note: Drop Luggage before check-in

items.title: Akatsuka Botanical Garden
items.description: Take a peaceful stroll through the garden, featuring ponds, bonsai collections, and seasonal blooms
items.note: Ideal for photos and quiet reflection

items.title: Airbnb Check-in
items.description: Check into Airbnb accommodation in Itabashi City
items.note: Rest and freshen up after check-in

items.title: Explore Shinjuku
items.description: Take JR Yamanote Line from Itabashi to Shinjuku Station
items.note: Direct train to Shinjuku Station

items.title: Dinner at Halal Honolu Shinjukugyoenmae
items.description: Enjoy authentic halal ramen at this popular halal restaurant near Shinjuku Gyoen
items.note: Halal-certified ramen with prayer space available

items.title: Return to Itabashi Airbnb
items.description: Take JR train back to Itabashi Station
items.note: Direct route back to accommodation

title: Ueno, Akihabara and Asakusa City Exploration

items.title: Ueno Park
items.description: Explore the Ueno Park
items.note: Popular city park featuring ample walking paths, a lake with boat rentals, a zoo & several museums.

items.title: Arrive in Akihabara
items.description: Begin exploration of Akihabara Electric Town, Tokyo’s tech and anime hub
items.note: Start from Electric Town Exit for best access

items.title: Yodobashi Camera Akihabara
items.description: Explore 9 floors of electronics, gadgets, games and cameras
items.note: Try hands-on tech demos and gaming floors

items.title: Akihabara Radio Kaikan
items.description: Visit the iconic 10-floor complex for anime figures, trading cards, and model kits
items.note: Don’t miss Kaiyodo and Volks collectible floors

items.title: Super Potato Retro Game Store
items.description: Discover nostalgic video game consoles and retro cartridges from the 80s–90s era
items.note: Great place for rare Famicom and Game Boy finds

items.title: Don Quijote Akihabara
items.description: Shop souvenirs, snacks, toys and quirky Japanese gifts in this massive discount store
items.note: Perfect stop for souvenirs; AKB48 Café nearby

items.title: Travel to Asakusa
items.description: Take train from Akihabara to Asakusa area
items.note: Direct train via Tsukuba Express to Asakusa

items.title: Halal Dinner at Wagyu Yakiniku Panga
items.description: Enjoy premium Halal Wagyu BBQ at this certified Halal restaurant in Asakusa area
items.note: Must book (1 month in advance)

items.title: Travel to Ginza
items.description: Take Tokyo Metro from Shibuya to Ginza Station
items.note: Direct metro line to Ginza

items.title: Ginza Six
items.description: Visit the modern shopping complex with luxury brands and rooftop garden
items.note: Rooftop garden offers great views of Ginza

items.title: ASICS Store Ginza
items.description: Check out the ASICS flagship store for premium running shoes and exclusive Japan collections
items.note: Try the 3D foot scanning experience for personalized fitting

items.title: YONEX Tokyo Flagship Store Ginza
items.description: Visit the YONEX flagship store for latest sports gear and Japan-exclusive badminton apparel
items.note: Limited-edition rackets and clothing often available only in Japan

items.title: Halal Lunch at Tendon Ginza
items.description: Enjoy halal tempura rice bowl at this certified halal restaurant
items.note: Halal-certified tempura and rice bowls

items.title: Go to Shibuya
items.description: Take Ginza Station to Shibuya Station
items.note: Ginza Line (Platform 1)

items.title: Shibuya Sky
items.description: Visit the observation deck for panoramic views of Tokyo from 229 meters high
items.note: ¥2,700 for adults to enter before 3:00 PM and ¥3,400 after 3:00 PM when purchased online

items.title: Shibuya Crossing
items.description: Visit the famous Shibuya Crossing, one of the busiest pedestrian crossings in the world
items.note: Best time to visit is evening when neon lights illuminate the area

items.title: Return to Itabashi Airbnb
items.description: Take metro and JR train back to Itabashi Station
items.note: Direct route back to accommodation

items.title: Check Out from Itabashi AirBnb
items.description: Take train Narimasu Station - Ikebukuro Station
items.note: Tobu Tojo Line Platform 3/4

items.title: Arrive at Sunshine City Prince Hotel
items.description: Standby at Bus Stop
items.note: Arrive 20 minutes prior to departure

items.title: Bus to Fuji
items.description: Take bus kawaguchiko Line
items.note: Journey hour by 2 hours and half

items.title: Arrive at Lake Kawaguchi
items.description: Visit Tokyo's oldest and most significant Buddhist temple

items.title: Checkin at Hostel 1889
items.description: Self checkin at reservation
items.note: https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/561789379215305242?viralityEntryPoint=1&s=76&source_impression_id=p3_1754119394_P3HsMccoSdf5QVJs

items.title: Bus to Fuji Q
items.description: Take the bus from Tokyo to Fuji Q (approx. 30 minutes)
items.note: Use JR Pass if available

items.title: Fuji Q Highland
items.description: Team A
items.note: Best visited early to avoid crowds

items.title: Lake Kawaguchi
items.description: Team B
items.note: Best visited early to avoid crowds

items.title: Arrive at HND Airport
items.description: Flight depart from Haneda Aiport
items.note: Arrive for earlier prepare

items.title: Depart from HND Airport (D7 523)
items.description: Flight depart from Haneda Aiport
items.note: Arrive 4 Hours prior to departure

items.title: Arrive at KUL Airport
items.description: Perform Immigration Check and Fresh up
items.note: Early check-in available for additional fee
